website_summaries.verdict: This MCAT study guide is geared towards students with test-taking anxieties or those seeking a condensed "Spark Notes" approach to test preparation.
pros: Information is concisely written, with many opportunities for reinforcement
Includes real world advice on test taking
Contains helpful links to online material
cons: Closer to a test taking strategy guide than a comprehensive study guide

customer_reviews.title: Useful resource with a practice test included
customer_reviews.text: Like AAMC will tell you, there are no true secrets to the MCAT. Put in 300-500 hours over 3-6 months. if you think any book is going to replace that, you need to get over it and commit to doing the work. As a resource for the price, this is value add and I would recommend it, despite what naysayers have said. Just get past the fact that there are no true secrets but its a good resource nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: JeffreyS

customer_reviews.title: Good kindle for your next bonfire
customer_reviews.text: Avoid this terrible book. It is garbage. I'm disappointed I never got around to returning it in time. SO MANY TYPOS AND MISTAKES! Really not helpful at all. The material it covers is all in paragraph form and not very easy to study from, it might as well be a poorly written text book. Don't waste the money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this book. Outdated. Gives you tips that are illegal in test centers.
customer_reviews.author: Laurenz

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for content review. Easy to read text makes it easy to follow along.
customer_reviews.author: Mashal Chhotani

customer_reviews.title: I found this book to be useful and instructive in my studying for the MCAT
customer_reviews.text: I found this book to be useful and instructive in my studying for the MCAT. Thank you for putting together such a great learning tool!
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful guide. Really pinpoints areas of interest on MCAT exams and makes you feel well prepared.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable price/quality ratio!
customer_reviews.text: The size of this book can be scary, but don't be fooled! It's a well structured book, touches all the important points for the exam, has tests and strategies. No color pictures... :( Is it all you need to ace the test? Likely not. I would certainly do many other tests. Price can't be any better, competition is left in the dust. Check it out inside on the product link to get a better idea.
customer_reviews.author: Tonny Robbiani

customer_reviews.title: Great review content!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the testing strategies and tips for test taking. Strategic test taking skills is one of my main issues. I can get the concepts down but the stress of the MCAT is overwhelming. The content is good, my only critique content wise is that it would be very beneficial if the pictures and diagrams were in color. That was a big disappointment. and that some pages were way too content heavy. It was difficult to shuffle through some of the text on some subjects.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best MCAT Review Book out there!
customer_reviews.text: This MCAT prep book has exceptional quality! Pages are crisp and clean which make a very nice writing surface! The book provides review questions and test secrets to help you during the actual exam! Another great feature about this book is that it includes directions to receive a free audio book version which will help when studying! When you receive the book, the first page gives you who to contact to receive the CD! Overall, I would definitely recommend this product to my friends who are taking this test!
customer_reviews.author: Gavin Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Great help for MCAT!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this book, because it has a lot of information, that are thought in schools, colleges. Also, it has information that are not thought deeply. It is a great book for those who happen to forget many things very quickly, so they can remind themselves what was thought in class either yesterday, last year or many years ago. Thumbs up, I am very fond of it. Thank you for your help!
customer_reviews.author: Firuza

customer_reviews.title: This book is absolutely amazing. It has everything and anything you need help ...
customer_reviews.text: This book is absolutely amazing. It has everything and anything you need help on to study for the MCAT. Everything is very well written out and explain thoroughly. The science aspect is very well written out and is small but very concise with only narrowing down what you need to know. The size is intimidating but definitely worth it. The practice tests are a great help too. Definitely loving this study guide. Thank you Momentrix you have saved my butt!!
customer_reviews.author: HonestReviewer911

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent resource to get a quick overview of each subject
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent resource to get a quick overview of each subject. I appreciate the fact that the author didn't use a lot of rhetoric. I'm using it along with the TEAS6 for more precise info on Science and English.
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: Full Review- Great Material
customer_reviews.text: Very in-depth study guide with information that is incredibly useful. It encompasses everything from environmental distractions and how to avoid them to the real content needed to learn for the big day. The questions are challenging and geared to shift your mind towards thinking the way you need to for the exam and I am also hoping for well after that.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great pick up
customer_reviews.text: I recently just bought this product and based on the reviews and going through the pages I feel like I am going to love this book and that it will help me greatly! Update: this book is a really good studying tool and the test taking strategies they give you is very useful for other exams as well. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: dorian

customer_reviews.title: Good Starter Book
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t got in depth with the book, but flipping through it, it’s a good quality book with enough information to get started with as a college sophomore preparing herself for medical school.
customer_reviews.author: Shante Fields

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product!
customer_reviews.text: Very organized and straight to the point. Does a great job explaining without all the fluff. Also there are videos that you can access from the book that further explain topics.
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: I think of it as a book not useful just for a test but a source or a ...
customer_reviews.text: These guide is extensive as the content itself, however it is well structured and organized. The practice tests are definitely a plus. I think of it as a book not useful just for a test but a source or a reference guide to consult in future occasions. Thanks Mometrix
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great supplement
customer_reviews.text: I like how it covers the high yield topics in a concise way. It is easy to follow along and understand.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Lazo

customer_reviews.title: This guide provides a great overview of each different component covered in the MCAT
customer_reviews.text: This guide provides a great overview of each different component covered in the MCAT, including O Chem, bio, anatomy, and even a fairly comprehensive section on psychology, sociology, and behavioral principles. Each section is dense, but feels more detailed and comprehensive that Sparknote style guides. The book also contains sample questions and answers. At the end, there are some great video links with online access codes for critical analysis/reasoning skills practice. Overall, very helpful book that condenses an enormous amount of information in a clear and manageable way.
customer_reviews.author: Cbaker

customer_reviews.title: Great book
customer_reviews.text: This book is an extremely good guide and summary of everything that is needed to look over before the MCAT exam!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Mikesell

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This ebook is great! I am very happy with the affordable price and tools located inside! Excited to dig in, Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Agnieszka

customer_reviews.title: I'm very excited and well pleased with the study guide
customer_reviews.text: I'm very excited and well pleased with the study guide. It contain absolutely all the resources for an excellent preparation. I recommend this book and Mometrix product always
customer_reviews.author: Sade

product_meta.title: MCAT Prep Book: MCAT Secrets Study Guide: MCAT Practice and Review for the Medical College Admission Test
